titles.title: A bill to amend the Harmonized Schedule of the United States with respect to the tariff treatment of pharmaceutical grade phospholipids and soybean oil.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S3051)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 3/17/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce the duty on: (1) pharmaceutical grade phospholipids; and (2) pharmaceutical grade soybean oil.
